content: Dashboard layout looks great! I've incorporated the user feedback from our research sessions and ensured all key metrics are prominently displayed.
Perfect! The responsive design handles all our target screen sizes beautifully. Approved for implementation.
Chart.js implementation is complete with interactive tooltips and smooth animations. Performance is good on desktop but needs mobile optimization.
Mobile performance is critical for our user base. Please optimize for devices with slower processors and implement proper responsive breakpoints.
The habit creation wizard includes 5 different templates and a custom option. User testing showed 90% completion rate with the new flow.
Outstanding work! The user experience is smooth and the templates cover all our primary use cases. Well done!
Question about the main dashboard priority: Should the habit tracking cards take up the full width on mobile, or should we maintain the grid layout?
For mobile, let's go with full-width cards for better touch targets and readability. The grid layout can be preserved for tablet and desktop.
Calendar drag-and-drop is working well with smooth animations. Working on event persistence layer and timezone calculations.
Analytics data models are taking shape. Implementing efficient aggregation queries for large datasets. ETA for completion is tomorrow morning.
Security audit reveals we need to implement CSRF protection and update our CORS policies. Also recommend adding rate limiting to API endpoints.
Initial performance analysis shows opportunity for 40% improvement in load times through code splitting and lazy loading. Starting implementation.
